title: I Am My Wife - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Gender Bender   Romance   School Life   Shoujo   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Age Regression   Beautiful Female Lead   Fast Learner   Female Protagonist   Male to Female   Modern Day   Parallel Worlds   Reincarnation   Wealthy Characters
author: Luànshì Yín Niáng   乱世银娘
description:
This story is about a young man who ended up traveling to the past. However, for some reason, he was transmigrated as Ye Wen, his perfect dream girl who did not exist in his memories before.

Now, imagine……yourself meeting your perfect ideal girl/boy. Will there be any kind of spark between the two of you or will you just ignore him/her?>
